item.title: Nomy add a quote by Moshe Kasher
item.description: "I told you I was a fucking cowboy." -- Moshe Kasher

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Ana Castillo
item.description: "The man you love cooking for you is good for you too." -- Ana Castillo

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Ernesto "Che" Guevara
item.description: "At the risk of seeming ridiculous, let me say that the true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love. It is impossible to think of a genuine revolutionary lacking this quality." -- Ernesto "Che" Guevara

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Emiliano Zapata
item.description: "¡Prefiero morir de pie que vivir siempre arrodillado! " -- Emiliano Zapata

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Ernesto "Che" Guevara
item.description: "Let the world change you and you can change the world" -- Ernesto "Che" Guevara

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Cesar Chavez
item.description: "When the man who feeds the world by toiling in the fields is himself deprived of the basic rights of feeding, sheltering, and caring for his own family, the whole community of man is sick." -- Cesar Chavez

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Ernesto Quinonez
item.description: "i think you're worth all the souls in hell. thass thousands of more souls than there are in heavan. So you're worth a lot, pana." -- Ernesto Quinonez

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Ana Castillo
item.description: "You say your city the way some Americans say this is their country. You never feel right saying that - my country. For some reason looking Mexican means you can't be American." -- Ana Castillo

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Demetria Martinez
item.description: "Lately, when asked, I have tended to say that I'm Mexican. I like the word because it still makes so many people flinch." -- Demetria Martinez

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Demetria Martinez
item.description: "No one lacks voice. Not even the dead. But many lack ears, the ability to hear those stories out of which the most destitute of people are forging their destines, breathing life into bleached bones. " -- Demetria Martinez

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Erykah Badu
item.description: "He definitely does what a partner is supposed to do, that is, evolve you." -- Erykah Badu

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "I tried to keep myself away from him by using con words like "fidelity" and "adultery", by telling myself that he would interfere with my work, that I had him I'd be too happy to write. I tried to tell myself I was hurting Bennett, hurting myself, making a spectacle of myself. I was. But nothing helped. I was possessed. The minute he walked into a room and smiled at me, I was a goner." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "Though my friends envied me because I always seemed so cheerful and confident, I was secretly terrified of practically everything." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Russell Brand
item.description:
"Of all the consumer products, chewing gum is perhaps the most ridiculous: it literally has no nourishment – you just chew it to give yourself something to do with your stupid idiot Western mouth.
Half the world is starving, and the other’s going, ‘I don’t actually need any nutrition, but it would be good to masticate, just to keep my mind off things." -- Russell Brand

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Junot Díaz
item.description: "Entonces cállate la fucking boca." -- Junot Díaz

item.title: Nomy add a quote by Junot Díaz
item.description: "Nobody likes children, your mother assured you. That doesn't mean you don't have them." -- Junot Díaz

item.title: Nomy add a quote by rubyetc
item.description: "Living in terms of everything you're not is a toxic way to exist." -- rubyetc
